LanguageData.DrugDesireFascination.stages.chemical_wa: I'm fascinated by drugs. I want to experience them more.
LanguageData.DrugDesireFascination.stages.chemical_hu: I'm fascinated by drugs. I want to experience them a lot harder.
LanguageData.DrugDesireFascination.stages.chemical_st: I'm fascinated by drugs. I want them! More intensity!
LanguageData.DrugDesireFascinationSatisfied.stages.ch: I'm fascinated by drugs, and I love satisfying my desires.
I'm fascinated by drugs, and I am fully satisfied with my drug consumption.
I'm interested in drugs. I want to try more.
LanguageData.DrugDesireInterest.stages.chemical_hunge: I'm interested in drugs. I want to experience a lot more.
LanguageData.DrugDesireInterest.stages.chemical_starv: I'm interested in drugs. I want to consume drugs really badly.
LanguageData.DrugDesireInterestSatisfied.stages.chemi: I'm interested in drugs. I enjoyed satisfying my desire.
I'm interested in drugs. I am really satisfied with all the drugs I've gotten recently.
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.hideous_environment.de: This place is unbearably grotesque. I can't look at this any more.
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.ugly_environment.label: ugly environment
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.ugly_environment.descr: This place is really ugly. I wish I didn't have to look at this any more.
This place is kind of unsightly. I wish I didn't have to look at all this.
I really like this place. It's beautiful.
LanguageData.NeedBeauty.stages.gorgeous_environment.d: This place is beautiful. It lifts me up and makes me love life.
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.uncomfortable.label: uncomfortable
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.uncomfortable.descrip: I've been kind of uncomfortable recently. We need to get something soft to sit on around here.
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.comfortable.label: comfortable
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.extremely_comfortable: I've been extremely comfortable recently. This place is so cushy!
LanguageData.NeedComfort.stages.luxuriantly_comfortab: I am resting on clouds of heaven.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.hungry.label: hungry
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.ravenously_hungry.label: ravenously hungry
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.ravenously_hungry.descri: These hunger pangs are hard to ignore.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.malnourished.label: malnourished
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.malnourished.description: It's been so long since I ate. I'm all fuzzy and it's hard to focus. My body is starting to waste away.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.badly_malnourished.label: badly malnourished
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.badly_malnourished.descr: I can feel my body wasting away. My stomach hurts like never before.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.starving.label: starving
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.starving.description: I can barely think about anything but food. My skin is stretching over my bones. Am I going to die?
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.advanced_starvation.desc: I can barely move or think about anything but food. My stomach hurts like never before. I feel like I'm going to pass out.
LanguageData.NeedFood.stages.extreme_starvation.label: extreme starvation
LanguageData.NeedIndoors.stages.just_outdoors.label: just outdoors
LanguageData.NeedIndoors.stages.outdoors.label: outdoors
LanguageData.NeedIndoors.stages.outdoors.description: I’ve been outside too much recently.
LanguageData.NeedIndoors.stages.long_outdoors.label: long outdoors
LanguageData.NeedIndoors.stages.long_outdoors.descrip: Being outside so much is wrong for me.
LanguageData.NeedIndoors.stages.very_long_outdoors.de: I’ve been outside way too much recently. This open space is so disturbing.
LanguageData.NeedIndoors.stages.brutal_outdoors.label: brutal outdoors
LanguageData.NeedIndoors.stages.brutal_outdoors.descr: These open spaces are driving me insane!
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreationstarved.label: recreation-starved
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreationstarved.descrip: It's been so long since I did anything for fun on my own time.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreationdeprived.label: recreation-deprived
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreationdeprived.descri: We need more variation in recreation activities, and I need time to enjoy them. This place is really dull.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreation_unfulfilled.de: We need more variation in the recreation activities, and I need time to enjoy them.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreation_satisfied.desc: I've been having a great time doing various things I like to do.
LanguageData.NeedJoy.stages.recreation_fully_satisfie: I've been enjoying myself so much, I love it!
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.entombed_underground: I've been underground too long. I feel like the weight of this mountain is crushing me. I need to see the sky and feel the wind.
How long have I been underground? I need to get out in the fresh air and spend some time under the sky.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.cabin_fever.label: cabin fever
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.cabin_fever.descript: I've spent so long indoors I feel like the roof is pressing in. I need to get out and see the sky.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.trapped_indoors.desc: It's been too long since I've seen the sky.
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.stuck_indoors.label: stuck indoors
LanguageData.NeedOutdoors.stages.stuck_indoors.descri: I'd like to go outside and get some fresh air.
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.drowsy.label: drowsy
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.drowsy.description: I haven't slept in a while. It's hard to keep focus.
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.tired.label: tired
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.tired.description: I'm so tired. I just want to lay down and rest for a few minutes...
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.exhausted.label: exhausted
LanguageData.NeedRest.stages.exhausted.description: I'm so exhausted I can barely stand. My eyelids have lead weights on them. Let me sleep...
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.confined_interior.de: This space is so tiny. I feel like a rat in a cage.
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.cramped_interior.des: This room is too small. I wish I had more space to move around and breathe.
LanguageData.NeedRoomSize.stages.spacious_interior.de: This room is so expansive, I feel free.
